Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 98, ME, 2000, XP, Vista, 7
  • Processor: Pentium II 600 MHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible 16MB video card that supports 16bit graphics
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
